m :  hi  mary .  haven ' t seen you for ages !
w :  hi  mr .  jones .  yes  it has been such a long time since we met !
m :  have you made up your mind to take up business as a career ?
w :  yes .  actually  i ' ve already started .  i began my studies at the beginning of this term .
m :  very glad to hear it .  then what are you going to do when you finish ?
w :  oh  i shall go to hong kong to practice there .
m :  that ' s a good idea .  it must be easy to find a job in hong kong .
w :  oh  i think so .  you know there is a great deal of opportunities for business there .
m :  and english is very useful in your job .

w :  i think it will be very useful in many ways because there ' s a lot about business written in english .  besides  hong kong is an international trade center .  english is useful in almost all walks of life .
m :  then you ' ll be a very promising businesswoman there .
w :  that ' s my wish .  but i have to suffer now .
m :  no problem .  you can do it well  i ' m sure .

question: what does the woman mean by saying  " but i have to suffer now "  ?
choice: i must put my whole heart into my study from now on .
but i want to give it up now .
i can ' t deal with so many troubles now .
answer: i must put my whole heart into my study from now on .
